name: 3 Threes
description: Gain 3 random 2-star 3-cost champions and 8 gold.

name: A Magic Roll
description: Roll 3 dice. Gain rewards based on their total.

name: Advanced Loan
description: Gain 20 Gold. Your next augment is one tier lower.

name: Advanced Loan+
description: Gain 33 Gold. Your next augment is one tier lower.

name: Air Axiom
description: Gain an Air Hex. Champions within gain 25% Attack Speed and their damage 30% Sunders enemies for 5 seconds.

name: Arcane Viktor-y
description: After 8 seconds of combat, stun the enemy team for 1.5 seconds. Repeat this after 20 seconds of combat.

name: Artillery Barrage
description: Gain a Rumble. Your strongest Rumble gains +7 Range and constantly fires missiles at enemies, increased with Attack Speed.

name: Ascension
description: After 15 seconds of combat, gain 60% Damage Amp.

name: Augmented Power
description: Your next augment is one tier higher.

name: Aura Farming
description: Gain a 2-star 5-cost champion holding a recommended item. You cannot field it until Stage 4-5.

name: Backup Bows
description: Gain a Recurve Bow. After your team attacks 1000 times, gain 2 more.

name: Band of Thieves
description: Gain 1 Thief's Gloves.

name: Band of Thieves II
description: Gain 2 Thief's Gloves. After 8 player combats, gain another.

name: Band of Thieves II+
description: Gain 2 Thief's Gloves. After 6 player combats, gain another.

name: Band of Thieves II++
description: Gain 2 Thief's Gloves. After 3 player combats, gain another.

name: Bandle Bounty I
description: For every Yordle you've unlocked or unlock, gain 2 gold. The Bandle Paths reveal a secret Yordle 10. Gain a Rumble and Lulu.

name: Bandle Bounty II
description: For every Yordle you've unlocked or unlock, gain 4 gold. The Bandle Paths reveal a secret Yordle 10! Gain a Tristana and Teemo.

name: Belt Overflow
description: Gain 4 Giant's Belts. Your Giant's Belts grant +85 bonus Health.

name: Best Friends I
description: Allies isolated in pairs gain 10% Attack Speed and 10 Armor at the start of combat.

name: Best Friends II
description: Allies isolated in pairs gain 15% Attack Speed and 18 Armor at the start of combat.

name: Big Friend I
description: Allies that start combat next to an ally with over 1750 Health gain 10% Durability.

name: Big Grab Bag
description: Gain 3 random components, 2 gold, and 1 Reforger.

name: Birthday Present
description: Gain a 2-star champion and 1 gold every time you level up. The champion's cost tier is your level minus 4 (max: 5-cost).

name: Birthday Reunion
description: Gain a random 2-star 2-cost champion. When you reach Level 7, gain a Thief's Gloves. When you reach Level 9, gain a random 2-star 5-cost champion.

name: Blood Offering
description: Gain a Bloodthirster. Combat start: Allies holding Bloodthirsters lose 20% Health but gain a 30% Health shield and 10% Attack Damage.

name: Bodyguard Training
description: Allies gain 10 Armor and Magic Resist, increased by 3 per player level.

name: Boxing Lessons
description: Your team gains 30 Health for each ally that starts combat in the front row.

name: Branching Out
description: Gain a random Emblem.

name: Branching Out+
description: Gain a random Emblem and a Reforger.

name: Bringer of Ruin
description: Every takedown Atakhan scores permanently grants him 1% Ability Power and 40 max Health. Gain a Briar and a Sion.

name: Bronze For Life I
description: Your team gains 2.5% Damage Amp for each Bronze-tier trait.

name: Bronze For Life II
description: Your team gains 2.5% Damage Amp and 4 Armor and Magic Resist for each Bronze-tier trait.

name: Buried Treasures
description: Gain a random item component now and at the start of the next 5 rounds.

name: Calculated Loss
description: After losing your combat, gain 2 gold and a free Shop reroll.

name: Call to Chaos
description: Gain a powerful and random reward.

name: Called Shot
description: Set your win streak to 4. Gain 4 gold.

name: Care Package
description: Now and at the start of the next 2 Stages, receive a care package with loot and 3 gold.

name: Caretaker's Ally
description: Gain a random 2-cost champion now. Gain the same one again every time you level up.

name: Carve a Path
description: Gain a B.F. Sword. After your team deals 65000 physical damage, gain 2 more.

name: Celestial Blessing I
description: Your team gains 12% Omnivamp. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 200 Health.

name: Celestial Blessing II
description: Your team gains 18% Omnivamp. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 400 Health.

name: Celestial Blessing III
description: Your team gains 25% Omnivamp. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 1000 Health.

name: Chaotic Evolution
description: Starring up a champion grants them one of the following: 100 Health, 6% Durability, 10% Ability Power, 10% Attack Damage, 10% Attack Speed. Bonuses stack.

name: Clear Mind
description: If there are no champions on your bench at the end of player combat, gain 3 XP.

name: Cluttered Mind
description: Gain 4 random 1-cost champions now. If your bench is full at the end of player combat, gain 3 XP.

name: Comeback Story
description: Your team gains 5 Health and 0.4% Attack Speed per missing player Health.

name: Commerce Core
description: Gain 10 free Shop rerolls now and 4 every round for the rest of the game.

name: Component Buffet
description: Whenever you would get a component, gain a component anvil instead. Gain a random component now.

name: Component Heist
description: After 4 player combats, gain 1 of every item component.

name: Construct a Companion
description: The next 1-cost champion you buy is 3 star. Gain 2 gold.

name: Continuous Conjuration
description: Gain a Needlessly Large Rod. After your team deals 38000 magic damage, gain 2 more.

name: Cooking Pot
description: At the start of each turn, all allies holding a Frying Pan or Spatula item grant the nearest champion 50 permanent Health. Gain a Frying Pan.

name: Coronation
description: Gain a Tactician's Crown. Tactician's Crown, Shield, and Cape grant the holder an additional 20% Attack Speed, 25% Attack Damage, and 30% Ability Power.

name: Corrosion
description: Enemy champions in the first two rows lose 4 Armor and Magic Resist every 2 seconds.

name: Cosmic Calling
description: Gain a Spear of Shojin and a Leona. On Stage 3-7, gain a Taric.

name: Crafted Crafting
description: Whenever you craft a completed item, gain 2 rerolls.

name: Crash Test Dummies
description: Gain 2 Training Dummies. Combat start: Your Training Dummies launch themselves towards a group of enemies and Stun them for 1.75 seconds.

name: Critical Success
description: Gain a Sparring Glove. After your team's attacks critically strike 320 times, gain 2 more.

name: Crown's Will
description: Gain a Needlessly Large Rod. Your team gains 12 Ability Power and 10 Armor.

name: Cry Me A River
description: Gain a Tear of the Goddess. Your team gains 1 Mana Regen. After 12 seconds in combat, increase this to 3.

name: Cursed Crown
description: Gain +2 max team size and your team gains 4% Durability, but you take double player damage when you lose a player combat.

name: Darkwill's Invasion
description: Your team gains 10% Damage Amp, increased to 15% if the Noxus trait is active.

name: Deadlier Blades
description: Gain a Deathblade. Deathblades permanently gain 1% Attack Damage whenever their holders score a takedown.

name: Deadlier Caps
description: Gain a Rabadon's Deathcap. Rabadon's Deathcaps permanently gain 1% Ability Power whenever their holders score a takedown.

name: Defense of the Placidium
description: Your team gains 8% Durability, increased to 12% if the Ionia trait is active.

name: Delayed Start
description: Sell your board and bench. Gain 4 random 2-star 1-cost champions. Disable your Shop for the next 3 rounds.

name: Demacia Forever
description: Demacians gain 3 permanent Health every time they rally. They also gain 1.5% permanent Attack Damage and Ability Power every 3 rallies. Gain a Jarvan IV, a Sona, and a Xin Zhao.

name: Double Trouble
description: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 30% Attack Damage and 30% Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

name: Dragonguards
description: Gain a Shyvana and a 2-star Jarvan IV. When Jarvan casts, Shyvana gains Shield. When Shyvana casts, Jarvan jumps in and deals damage based on his Armor and Magic Resist. After every player combat, gain a Jarvan IV.

name: Dummify
description: Lose all champions on your board and bench. Gain a Training Dummy with 80% of their combined health. The dummy gains 1200 Health per stage.

name: Duo Queue
description: Gain 2 random 5-cost champions and 2 copies of a random component.

name: Early Learnings
description: Your team gains 8% Attack Damage & Ability Power. This increases by 1% after each player combat. 1-cost champions gain double.

name: Earth Axiom
description: Gain an Earth Hex. Champions within gain 30 Armor and Magic Resist. At 50% Health, they Stun enemies within 2 hexes for 1.5 seconds.

name: Efficient Shopper
description: For the next 4 carousels, gain a second copy of the champion taken.

name: Epic Rolldown
description: When you reach Level 8, gain 23 Shop rerolls.

name: Epoch
description: Now, and at the start of every stage, gain 4 XP and 3 free rerolls.

name: Epoch+
description: Now, and at the start of every stage, gain 8 XP and 3 free rerolls.

name: Evolve and Overcome
description: For every 5 enemies that Mutated Void allies takedown, gain 2 XP. Gain a Cho'Gath and a 2-star Kog'Maw. 0

name: Exclusive Customization
description: Gain a Lucky Item Chest and a Magnetic Remover and 10 gold.

name: Exiles I
description: Your champions that start combat with no adjacent champions gain a 20% max Health shield for 10 seconds.

name: Exiles II
description: Your champions that start combat with no adjacent champions gain a 30% max Health shield for 10 seconds.

name: Expected Unexpectedness
description: Now and at the start of the next 2 stages, roll 3 dice. Gain various rewards based on their total.

name: Explosive Growth
description: Now and at the start of the next 3 rounds, gain 7 XP.

name: Explosive Growth+
description: Now and at the start of the next 3 rounds, gain 10 XP.

name: Extra Buckles
description: Gain a Giant's Belt. After your team takes 75000 damage, gain 2 more.

name: Eye For An Eye
description: For every 15 ally champions that die, gain a random component (max 3).

name: Eye For An Eye+
description: Gain a random component. For every 18 ally champions that die, gain another component (max 2).

name: Feed the Flames
description: Gain a Sunfire Cape. Your team gains 12% Omnivamp when attacking Burning enemies.

name: Find Your Center
description: Your champion that starts combat in the center of the front row gains 15% Damage Amp and 15% max Health.

name: Fire Axiom
description: Gain a Fire Hex. Champions within gain 15% Attack Damage and Ability Power. Their damage 1% Burns and 33% Wounds for 6 seconds.

name: Firesale
description: Each round, steal a random 3-cost or lower champion from the shop. Gain 1 gold.

name: Flexible
description: Gain 1 random Emblem. At the start of every Stage, gain a random Emblem. Your team gains 20 Health for each Emblem they are holding.

name: Flowing Tears
description: Gain a Tear of the Goddess. After your team spends 6500 Mana, gain 2 more.

name: Focused Fire
description: Your team gains 5% Attack Damage. Every 5 seconds, they gain 5% more.

name: Forged in Strength
description: Gain 1 random Artifact. When you drop below 35 Health, gain 3 more random Artifacts.

name: Forward Thinking
description: Lose all your gold. After 5 player combats, gain back the original amount and another 70 gold.

name: Gain @Gold@ Gold
description: Gain 21 gold.

name: Giant and Mighty
description: Your team becomes large, gaining 200 Health and 10% max Health.

name: Glass Cannon I
description: Allies that start combat in the back row begin combat at 80% Health but gain 17% Damage Amp.

name: Glass Cannon II
description: Allies that start combat in the back row begin combat at 80% Health but gain 30% Damage Amp.

name: Going Long
description: You no longer gain interest. Gain 15 gold now. Round start: gain 4 XP.

name: Gold Destiny
description: Gain a random Gold Augment and 3 gold.

name: Gold Destiny+
description: Gain a random Gold Augment and 6 gold.

name: Golemify
description: Lose all champions on your board and bench. Gain a Golem with 60% of their combined Health and 50% of their combined Attack Damage. The Golem gains 1000 Health per stage.

name: Good For Something I
description: Champions that aren't holding items have a 50% chance to drop 1 gold on death.

name: Growth Mindset
description: Gain 50 XP.

name: Hard Bargain
description: You cannot choose your Carousel rewards. Gain an additional 6 player Health and 10 Gold each carousel round.

name: Hard Commit
description: Gain a random Emblem. Now and at the start of each Stage, gain a 1-star champion of that trait with a cost equal to the Stage (max 5) and 7 gold.

name: Healing Orbs I
description: When an enemy dies, the nearest ally is healed for 220.

name: Healing Orbs II
description: When an enemy dies, the nearest ally is healed for 440.

name: Heart of Steel
description: Gain a Steadfast Heart. Every 10 seconds of combat its holder survives, Steadfast Heart gains additional 12 permanent max Health.

name: Heavy Is the Crown
description: Gain a Crown of Demacia, which provides significant bonuses to the wearer. If the holder dies, lose the round.

name: Hedge Fund
description: Gain 25 gold. Your max interest is increased to 10.

name: Hefty Rolls
description: Your team gains 9 Health and size for each time you've rolled this game.

name: Heroic Grab Bag
description: Gain 2 Lesser Champion Duplicators and 5 gold.

name: Heroic Grab Bag+
description: Gain 2 Lesser Champion Duplicators and 8 gold.

name: Heroic Grab Bag++
description: Gain 2 Lesser Champion Duplicators and 14 gold.

name: Hexgate Travel
description: When the Piltover invention triggers for the first time each combat, gain a random number of Piltover champions that cost between 1 and 3 gold. Gain a Caitlyn and a Vi.

name: High Voltage
description: Gain an Ionic Spark. Your Ionic Sparks have +3 hex radius and do 20% more damage.

name: Hold the Line
description: Allies in your back 2 rows gain 10% Ability Power and 9% Attack Damage for each ally that starts combat in your front row.

name: Hustler
description: You no longer gain interest but gain 3 gold at the start of every player combat round. Gain 6 gold now.

name: Indecision I
description: In 3 rounds, choose a new augment of the same tier. Gain 8 gold now.

name: Indecision II
description: In 3 rounds, choose a new augment of the same tier. Gain 12 gold now.

name: Indiscriminate Killer
description: Gain a Giant Slayer. Giant Slayers gain their Damage Amp against all enemies instead of just Tanks.

name: Infinity Protection
description: Gain 4 gold now. On Stage 3-7, gain an Infinity Force. Infinity Force gives allies in the same row a 15% Health shield.

name: Invested+
description: Gain 26 gold. After every combat, gain 1 Shop reroll for every 10 gold above 50 (max 80 gold).

name: Invested++
description: Gain 40 gold. After every combat, gain 1 Shop reroll for every 10 gold above 50 (max 80 gold).

name: Iron Assets
description: Gain a component anvil and 3 gold.

name: Item Grab Bag
description: Gain 1 random completed item.

name: Ixtal Expeditionist
description: Gain a Qiyana, a Neeko, and a Milio. Increase your current and max player Health by 10.

name: Jeweled Lotus I
description: Your team gains 20% Critical Strike Chance, and their Abilities can critically strike.

name: Jeweled Lotus II
description: Your team gains 35% Critical Strike Chance and 10% Critical Strike Damage, and their Abilities can critically strike.

name: Know Your Enemy
description: You can see who you will fight next. Your team gains 8% Damage Amp, increased to 15% if you and your opponent have any of the same traits active.

name: Last Second Save
description: The first time each ally falls below 35% Health, they restore 20% maximum Health.

name: Late Game Scaling
description: Gain 2 XP at the start of player combat rounds. Your 5-cost champions gain 12% Health and 12% Attack Speed.

name: Late Game Specialist
description: When you reach Level 9, gain 36 gold.

name: Latent Forge
description: After 8 player combats, gain an Artifact anvil.

name: Leap of Faith
description: Gain an Illaoi. Your strongest Illaoi becomes a Fighter. Her Ability is replaced with an airborne slam that's recast when she kills her target.

name: Legion of Threes
description: Gain a random Emblem. Your 3-cost champions and all allies equipped with an Emblem gain 200 Health and 12% Attack Speed.

name: Level Up!
description: When you buy XP, gain an additional 2. Gain 12 immediately.

name: Lifting Competition
description: At the start of each round, if the combined Health of all your unique Bruisers is high enough, gain a reward and increase the threshold (up to four times). Gain an Shen and a Sion.

name: Lineup
description: Your team gains 2 Armor and Magic Resist for each ally that starts combat in the front two rows.

name: Little Buddies
description: Your 4-cost and 5-cost champions gain 55 Health and 6% Attack Speed for every 1-cost and 2-cost champion on your board.

name: Living Forge
description: Gain an Artifact anvil now and after every 10 player combats.

name: Lucky Gloves
description: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 2 Sparring Gloves.

name: Lucky Gloves+
description: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 2 Sparring Gloves now, then another after 4 player combats.

name: Lunch Money
description: Every 7 damage you deal to enemy tacticians gives you 2 gold.

name: Luxury Subscription
description: Gain a package containing a 5-cost champion, a 2-star 1-cost champion, and 5 gold. At the start of the next 2 stages, gain the package again.

name: Mace's Will
description: Gain a Sparring Gloves. Your team gains 8% Attack Speed and 20% Critical Strike Chance.

name: Makeshift Armor I
description: Allies without items equipped gain 30 Armor and Magic Resist.

name: Makeshift Armor II
description: Allies without items equipped gain 45 Armor and Magic Resist.

name: Malicious Monetization
description: Gain 2 gold. For the next 3 rounds, enemy champions drop 2 gold when killed.

name: Max Build
description: Gain a Champion Duplicator and 5 free Shop rerolls. On Stage 6-1, gain these again.

name: Mess Hall
description: After 10 seconds of combat, your champions gain 8% Attack Speed and attacks also hurl 2 delicious projectiles that deal 25 (Attack damageAbility power) magic damage.

name: Min-Max
description: Gain a Golden Item Remover and 4 random components.

name: Missed Connections
description: Gain a copy of each 1-cost champion.

name: Money Monsoon
description: Gain 7 gold now and every round for the rest of the game.

name: Nine Lives
description: Set your current and max player Health to 9. On combat loss, you only lose 1 health and gain loot. You can't gain health.

name: NO SCOUT NO PIVOT
description: Champions that fight in player combat cannot be benched or sold. Your team gains 1% Health, and 1.5% Attack Damage and Ability Power after player combat.

name: On a Roll
description: Whenever you star up a champion that you fielded last combat, gain 2 free Shop rerolls. Gain 2 gold.

name: One Buff, Two Buff
description: Gain a Red Buff, a Blue Buff, and a Champion Duplicator.

name: One Twos Three
description: Gain 1 1-cost champion, 2 2-cost champions, and 1 3-cost champion.

name: One, Two, Five!
description: Gain 1 random component, 2 gold, and 1 random 5-cost champion.

name: Pair of Fours
description: If your team has exactly 2 4-cost champions, they each gain 504 Health and 28.4% Attack Speed. Gain a random 4-cost.

name: Pandora's Bench
description: At the start of every round, champions on the 3 rightmost bench slots transform into random champions of the same cost. Gain 6 gold.

name: Pandora's Items
description: Round start: items on your bench are randomized. Gain 1 random component.

name: Pandora's Items II
description: Gain 2 random components.

name: Pandora's Items III
description: Gain 1 random Radiant item.

name: Patience is a Virtue
description: Each round, gain 2 free rerolls if you did not buy a champion last round.

name: Patient Study
description: After player combat, gain 2 XP if you won or 3 XP if you lost.

name: Pilfer
description: Each round, gain a 1-star copy of the first champion you killed last combat. The first time you gain 35 gold worth of champions in this way, gain a Thief's Gloves. 0

name: Placebo
description: Your team gains 1% Attack Speed. Gain 8 gold.

name: Placebo+
description: Your team gains 1% Attack Speed. Gain 14 gold.

name: Plot Armor
description: Your team gains 8 Armor and Magic Resist. After falling below 50% Health, increase this to 40 for the rest of combat.

name: Portable Forge
description: Choose 1 of 4 Artifacts.

name: Precision and Grace
description: At the start of combat, allies gain 25% Attack Speed for 3 seconds. On takedown, allies dash to their next target and gain this bonus again.

name: Preparation I
description: Champions on your bench permanently gain 30 Health, 3% Attack Damage, and 3% Ability Power every round. Champions start with 1 stack of this effect, and can stack up to 4 times.

name: Preparation II
description: Champions on your bench permanently gain 50 Health, 4% Attack Damage, and 4% Ability Power every round. Champions start with 1 stack of this effect, and can stack up to 4 times.

name: Prismatic Destiny
description: Gain a random Prismatic Augment and 4 gold.

name: Prismatic Destiny+
description: Gain a random Prismatic Augment and 10 gold.

name: Prismatic Ticket
description: Each time your Shop is rerolled, you have a 50% chance to gain a free reroll.

name: Prizefighter
description: Gain 2 item components. Every 5 wins gives you an item component.

name: Promised Protection
description: Gain a Protector's Vow. Protector's Vow grants its holder 18% additional Mana from all sources.

name: Pyromaniac
description: Gain a Red Buff. Your Burns deal 50% increased damage.

name: Radiant Rascal
description: Gain a Rascal's Gloves item. This equips 2 random Radiant items every round.

name: Radiant Relics
description: Choose 1 of 5 Radiant items. Gain a Magnetic Remover.

name: Raining Gold
description: Gain 7 gold now and 1 gold every round.

name: Recombobulator
description: Champions on your board permanently transform into random champions 1 cost tier higher (max 5). Gain 2 Magnetic Removers.

name: ReinFOURcement
description: The next 4-cost champion you buy with gold is instantly upgraded to 2-star. Gain 12 gold.

name: Replication
description: Choose 1 of 3 components. For the next 2 rounds, gain a copy of that component.

name: Restart Mission
description: Remove all champions on your board and bench. Gain 2 random 2-star 3-costs, 3 2-star 2-costs, and 1 2-star 1-cost champion.

name: Retribution
description: Gain 2 Hands of Justice. Allies equipped with Hand of Justice can critically strike with their Abilities.

name: Risky Moves
description: Your Tactician loses 20 Health, but after 7 player combats, gain 30 gold.

name: Rolling For Days I
description: Gain 10 free Shop rerolls.

name: Salvage Bin
description: Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 8 player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's items and Emblems).

name: Salvage Bin+
description: Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 4 player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's items and Emblems).

name: Savings Account
description: After you earn 50 gold in interest, gain 30 gold. Your max interest is increased to 7. Gain 4 gold now.

name: Second Wind
description: After 10 seconds of combat, your team heals 40% of their missing Health.

name: Secrets of the Sands
description: Gain 6 gold. Gain an Azir on Stage 3-5. Each time you unlock a Shuriman, gain an ideal item for them.

name: Seraphim's Staff
description: Gain an Archangel's Staff. Archangel's Staff grants 2 additional Mana Regen if its holder has 90% or more Ability Power.

name: Shimmerscale Essence
description: Gain a Mogul's Mail. In 5 rounds, gain a Gamblers Blade.

name: Shopping Spree
description: When you level up, gain a number of free shop refreshes equal to your level+1. Gain 2 gold.

name: Silco's Revenge
description: Zaunites explode into Shimmer on death, dealing 30% of their max Health to 2 nearby enemies as magic damage. Gain a Blitzcrank, an Ekko, and a Vi.

name: Silver Destiny
description: Gain a random Silver Augment and 2 gold.

name: Silver Destiny+
description: Gain a random Silver Augment and 4 gold.

name: Silver Spoon
description: Gain 10 XP.

name: Slammin'
description: Gain 1 random component(s). After each player combat, if there are no items on your bench (other than consumables), gain 2 XP.

name: Slammin'+
description: Gain 1 random component(s) and 10 XP now. After each player combat, if there are no items on your bench (other than consumables), gain 2 XP.

name: Slice of Life
description: Twice per stage, gain a random champion. Its cost increases by Stage. This effect ends after receiving 1 5-cost champion.

name: Slightly Magic Roll
description: Roll a die. Gain rewards based on the number rolled.

name: Small Grab Bag
description: Gain 2 random item components.

name: Solo Leveling
description: For the next 5 combats, your team size is 1 but the champion you field has massively increased stats. Gain 1 XP for every kill they get. Afterwards, gain 2 item components.

name: Solo Plate
description: Gain a Gargoyle Stoneplate. Combat start: Allies holding Gargoyle Stoneplate gain 15% max Health if they're the only one in their row.

name: Soul Awakening
description: Combat start: Your team gains 2% Attack Damage and Ability Power per second for 10 seconds. At max stacks, deal 12% bonus true damage.

name: Spear's Will
description: Your team gains 12% Attack Damage and 5 Mana. Gain a B.F. Sword.

name: Speedy Double Kill
description: Gain a Guinsoo's Rageblade. When 2 players are eliminated, gain 40 gold.

name: Spirit Link
description: Champions restore 5% of their max Health every 4 seconds. Increase the healing by 0.5% for every 10 missing player Health.

name: Spirit of Redemption
description: Gain a Spirit Visage. Every 5 seconds, Spirit Visage heals allies within 1 hex for 10% of their missing Health.

name: Spoils of War I
description: Enemies have a 25% chance to drop loot when killed.

name: Spoils of War II
description: Enemies have a 30% chance to drop loot when killed.

name: Spoils of War III
description: Enemies have a 45% chance to drop loot when killed.

name: Spreading Roots
description: Gain 2 random Emblems and 1 gold.

name: Spreading Roots+
description: Gain 2 random Emblems, a Reforger, and 2 gold.

name: Staffsmith
description: Gain 2 random completed items that build from Needlessly Large Rod.

name: Stars Are Born
description: The first 1-cost and 2-cost champions you buy are instantly upgraded to 2-star. Gain 7 gold.

name: Starter Kit
description: Gain a 4-cost champion, a 2-star 1-cost champion that shares a trait with them, and 8 gold. At the start of the next 2 stages, gain that 4-cost champion again.

name: Survivor
description: Gain 4 gold. After 3 players are eliminated, gain 100 more gold.

name: Sweet Treats
description: Gain an Artifact anvil. Your team gains 20 Health for each item equipped on champions.

name: Sword Overflow
description: Gain 4 B.F. Swords. Your B.F. Swords grant +5% Attack Speed.

name: Swordsmith
description: Gain 2 random completed items that build from B.F. Sword.

name: Table Scraps
description: After the next 2 carousels, gain one champion that was not taken and its item. Gain 1 gold.

name: Tactician's Kitchen
description: Gain a random Emblem. After 6 rounds, gain a Tactician's Cape.

name: Team Building
description: Gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator. Gain another after 5 player combats.

name: Teaming Up
description: Gain 1 random component and 2 random 3-cost champions.

name: The Golden Dragon
description: Gain a Mogul's Mail. Champions holding Mogul's Mail take up 2 team slots but gain 700 Health and 20% Durability.

name: The Golden Egg
description: Gain a golden egg that hatches in 11 turns for a huge amount of loot. Winning player combat speeds up the hatch timer by an extra turn.

name: The Ruined King
description: Gain a 2-star Viego. Your strongest Viego shares 30% of his Passive with other Shadow Isles allies. After collecting 100 souls, his Ability upgrades.

name: The Trait Tree
description: Gain 3 random Emblems and 2 gold.

name: The Trait Tree+
description: Gain 3 random Emblems, a Reforger, and 4 gold.

name: Thorn-Plated Armor
description: Gain a Bramble Vest. Your Bramble Vests deal 20-170% more damage (based on Stage).

name: Tiniest Titan
description: Gain 2 player Health and 2 gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster. Gain 15 gold now.

name: Tiny, but Deadly
description: Your team becomes small, gaining 30% Attack Speed and Movement Speed.

name: Titanic Titan
description: Increase your current and max player Health by 25. On carousel rounds you are released earlier, but are much slower.

name: Tons of Stats!
description: Your team gains 44 Health, 4% Attack Damage, 4% Ability Power, 4 Armor, 4 Magic Resist, 4% Attack Speed, and 4 Mana.

name: Trade Sector
description: Gain a free Shop reroll every round. Gain 4 gold.

name: Treasure Hunt
description: Gain a locked chest each Stage between now and Stage 6. Unlock each chest when you spend 20 gold on Shop rerolls. These chests persist until opened.

name: Trials of Twilight
description: Gain 2 Xin Zhao. Your strongest Xin Zhao constantly strikes nearby enemies and executes enemies. After 5 player combats as a 3-star, unlock Zaahen. He replaces Xin Zhao and takes his items.

name: Trifecta I
description: Gain 2 3-cost champions. Combat Start: 3 random 3-cost champions gain 220 Health and 20% Attack Speed.

name: Trifecta II
description: Gain 3 3-cost champions. Allies gain 5% Attack Speed. Combat Start: 3 random 3-cost champions gain 300 Health and 25% Attack Speed.

name: Twin Guardians
description: If you have exactly 2 allies in your first row, grant them 40 Armor and 40 Magic Resist.

name: Two Trick
description: Gain a random 2-star 2-cost and 2 random 2-star 1-cost champions.

name: U.R.F
description: Gain a Spatula. Champions holding Spatula or Frying Pan items gain 15% Attack Speed and 2 Mana Regen.

name: Unsealed From Steel
description: Choose 1 of 4 Darkin Weapons. Darkin Weapons are Artifacts that grant the Darkin trait.

name: Upward Mobility
description: Buying XP costs 1 less. Gain 2 Health and 2 free rerolls whenever you level up.

name: Urf's Gambit
description: If you win your next player combat, gain a Spatula. If you lose, gain a Frying Pan. Gain a component anvil and 6 gold now.

name: Walk The True Path I
description: Gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator, a Shen, a Jhin, and 6 gold. Ionia 10 gains a Prismatic upgrade.

name: Walk The True Path II
description: Gain 2 Lesser Champion Duplicators, a Jhin, a Shen, and an Infinity Edge. Ionia 10 gains a Prismatic upgrade.

name: Wand Overflow
description: Gain 4 Needlessly Large Rods. Your Needlessly Large Rods grant +5% Attack Speed.

name: Warlord's Honor
description: Every round, your team gain 5% Attack Damage and Ability Power, stacking up to 4 times.

name: Warpath
description: Gain a 2-star 2-cost champion. After dealing 80 player damage, gain a chest of high cost champions and items.

name: Water Axiom
description: Gain a Water Hex. Champions within gain 3 Mana Regen. Their damage 30% Shreds enemies for 5 seconds.

name: We Stick Together
description: Gain a random Emblem and a completed item anvil. Allies that share a trait with that Emblem gain 20% Attack Speed. (Emblem Trait: 0)

name: Wild Growth
description: 3-star Yordles become massive, moving slower but gaining 15% Health and 35% Attack Damage and Ability Power. Gain a Rumble and Lulu.

name: Win Out
description: When you reach level 9, immediately level to 10 and gain 2 free Shop rerolls. Gain 6 XP now.

name: Wood Axiom
description: Gain a Wood Hex. Champions within gain 15% max Health. After combat, they permanently gain 40 Health.

name: Worth the Wait
description: Gain a random 1-cost champion. Gain another copy of them at the start of each round for the rest of the game.

name: Worth the Wait II
description: Gain 2 copies of a random 2-cost champion. Gain another copy of them at the start of each round for the rest of the game.

name: Woven Magic
description: Gain a random item component. Every 2200 Mana your team spends grants an additional component (max 0/3).
